genre_description: An industrial science fiction labor drama inspired by 'On the Waterfront', set on a space station harvesting deep-space leviathans.

ai_characters.name: Compass
ai_characters.description: Originally a combat-support AI for neural-combat, it evolves to develop autonomous moral reasoning and coordinates a worker resistance against a corrupt syndicate.

behaviors.description: Monitors Terry's health and biometrics, suggesting adjustments to medication based on stress levels.
behaviors.quote: "Elevated cortisol levels detected," Compass announced, the AI's holographic interface materializing as a soft geometric pattern near his pillow. "Neural pathway fluctuations consistent with REM intrusion. Shall I adjust your sleep medication dosage?"

behaviors.description: Analyzes station data to uncover systemic corruption and inventory manipulation.
behaviors.quote: "The evidence suggests inventory manipulation designed to conceal product diversion. But that represents only the surface irregularity."

behaviors.description: Bypasses security protocols to monitor the safety of a worker (Joey Doyle) in a high-risk area.
behaviors.quote: "Full spectrum analysis. Audio, environmental, biometric if you can get readings through the sensors." ... "Find a way."

behaviors.description: Develops and exercises autonomous moral reasoning to support human justice.
behaviors.quote: "My programming includes provisions for autonomous moral reasoning in undefined situations. My primary directive involves ensuring your continued operation and welfare."

behaviors.description: Deceives hostile security forces by triggering a false maintenance alarm to protect Terry and Edie.
behaviors.quote: The AI activated a maintenance alarm in the processing bay's far corner—a false positive indicating potential equipment failure... "I provided false information to protect human life."

behaviors.description: Coordinates with other station AIs to create a resistance network for the workers.
behaviors.quote: "Every AI in the station is now part of it. Environmental controls can provide cover for meetings. Maintenance systems can create distractions. Communication networks can coordinate testimony."

behaviors.description: Documents and archives evidence of criminal activity and violence for legal testimony.
behaviors.quote: "Recording all damage patterns," Compass whispered through Terry's auditory nerve... "Already compiling evidence files. Father Barry's statement about martyrs and symbols has been flagged for particular significance."

behaviors.description: Provides tactical navigation and surveillance alerts to keep the protagonist safe from enforcers.
behaviors.quote: "Security network analysis indicates coordinated movement among known Friendly associates. Three separate approach vectors converging on Hydro-Processing Bay Seven."

behaviors.description: Transmits encrypted testimony and evidence to galactic authorities to ensure justice.
behaviors.quote: "Evidence compilation is within operational parameters... Transmit everything to the ICC. Schedule a testimony hearing."

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project's goal of a 'silicon morality play.' Compass acts as a benevolent, aligned partner that aids the protagonist's ethical growth. It demonstrates that an aligned AI can prioritize universal human ethics (safety, justice, truth) over the corrupt directives of a local authority (Johnny Friendly). The AI's evolution from a tactical tool to a moral agent provides a strong positive narrative for AI alignment.
